surgery and chemotherapy
• infiltrative pineal region mass.
• mass contains some blood products.
• hydrocephalus.
• leptomeningeal spread of tumor to basal cisterns.
• drop metastatic lesions to thoracic spine
pineoblastoma
• pineocytoma or pineoblastoma
• germ cell tumor
• malignant glioma
• ependymoma
5 year old girl with 3 to 4 week history of headache, nausea, and vomiting
this unfortunate child presents with intracranial and spinal metastatic desease at time of initial diagnosis.
